WELCOME: Welcome to Trans link! Get transit information by asking me about a bus number and direction.
WHAT_DO_YOU_WANT: Ask me about a bus number. For example: when is the next 20 heading downtown?
NOTIFY_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Please enable Location permissions in the Amazon Alexa app.
NO_ADDRESS: It looks like you don't have an address set on your device. You can set your address from the Alexa app, or from the Alexa dashboard online
UNHANDLED: This skill doesn't support that. Please ask something else.
HELP: Ask me about a bus number. For example: when is the next 20 heading downtown?
